name: Federal Claim Paper Rebates
description:
Implement a rebate program for the acquisition of Claim Papers, with a rebate of 75 euros per Claim Paper for farmers and gathers, and 50 to everyone else. This program is applicable to individual farmers and gatherers for up to 30 Claim Papers, and to other eligible individuals for up to 10 Claim Papers. For corporate entities, eligibility for the program is determined based on whether the individual purchasing the Claim Papers is employed in a farming or gathering capacity.

Introduce a rebate for the purchase of Claim Stakes, offering a rebate of 300 euros per Claim Stake for farmers and gatherers, and 200 for everyone else. Farmers and gatherers are eligible for a rebate on up to 4 Claim Stakes, whereas other qualified individuals are limited to a rebate on one Claim Stake. In the context of corporate entities, the program's eligibility hinges on whether the individual responsible for purchasing the Claim Stakes holds a job as a farmer or gatherer.

properties.Title: Paper Logic
properties.UserDescription: Provide Papers at a lower price for Farmers or gatherers
